text: @andysc "Microservices are the new purple" is particularly brilliant when paired with the history of the purple dye (well, the recent history of coal tar and not the ancient history of killing a huge number of sea snails).

author.name: Ken Tindell 🌻 🐘 @kentindell@mastodon.social
author.description: Technologist and entrepreneur. CTO of automotive industry startup.
